xmldoc.short_description: Resume execution from a paused breakpoint.

description.p: dbcont resumes execution of file after pausing at a breakpoint. Execution continues until another breakpoint is encountered, a pause condition is met, an error occurs, or execution completes successfully.
Use dbcont to continue execution after examining workspace variables or debugging code.
Note: If you want to edit a file during debugging, it is recommended to first exit debug mode using dbquit to avoid unexpected behavior.

example_item.example_item_description: Resume execution after a breakpoint in a function.
